src.umd_vision.oCam package¶

Submodules¶

src.umd_vision.oCam.oCam module¶

This module is used to interface with a oCam device

class src.umd_vision.oCam.oCam.oCam(cam_settings)[source]¶

Provides an interface to an oCam camera device

Note

has only been tested on an oCam 5CRO-U found here http://withrobot.com/en/camera/ocam-5cro-u/

Example

./read_oCam.py -i 5 -t 10 -s
(5th interface, 10sec, show image)
./read_oCam.py -i 0 -t 5 -s -c 0.1 -n 1
(0th interface, 5 seconds, show, cut horizontall 10%, camera 1 (in case of multiple cameras))
load_camera(name='oCam')[source]¶

Finds and initializes camera. If multiple cameras are connected it will connect to the one in self.options.camera_number

Parameters:name (string) – camera name. defaults to “oCam”
set_settings()[source]¶

Sets camera settings.

Parameters:settings (dict) – dictionary containing values for settings
single_processed_image(verbose=True)[source]¶
single_raw_image(verbose=True)[source]¶
